Package at.htlkaindorf.entities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
at.htlkaindorf.entities.Player
public class Player
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
The player class is used to create the player. It extends the sprite class.

      public void update​(float dt)
      Sets the right sprite every frame and checks if the player is onCeiling and if true, the player stops gaining height.
      Parameters:
      dt - delta time
      Since:
      1.0
